intersection.description: Approaching or navigating through an intersection where the ego vehicle must consider stop lines, traffic lights, pedestrian crossings, and other vehicles.

roundabout.description: Navigating a circular intersection where vehicles must yield to traffic already in the roundabout before entering.

multi_lane_driving.description: Ego is driving on a multi-laned road that allows lane changing, considering a switch to an adjacent lane based on safety, comfort, and efficiency.

merging.description: Ego is driving on a merging lane which will end in a certain distance, considering merging into the target lane based on safety and comfort.

cross_walk.description: Ego approaches a crosswalk where pedestrians may be present, requiring appropriate yielding behavior.

overtaking.description: Ego considers overtaking a slower vehicle while ensuring safety, legality, and efficiency.
